title: A Famous Movie Director and His Wife Found Dead at Home
summary: Rob Reiner, a famous Hollywood director and actor, and his wife Michele were found dead in their home in Los Angeles. Police and firefighters went to their house on Sunday afternoon. The police are investigating this as a possible homicide, which means someone might have hurt them. Rob Reiner made many popular movies like When Harry Met Sally and Stand By Me. A family spokesperson shared a sad statement about their passing. Many people, including famous politicians, are sending tributes. The police have not arrested anyone yet and are still looking into what happened. The Los Angeles Fire Department got a call for help at the home in Brentwood, a neighborhood where many celebrities live. Rob Reiner started his career in the 1960s and became well-known for his role in the TV show All in The Family.
